name: To Never Doubt--That Is Power!
text:
Main You may give up to 2 active DON!! cards to your [Silvers Rayleigh]: Your opponent cannot activate if that Leader or Character attacks during this turn. 
#Counter Give up to 1 of your Characters or [Silvers Rayleigh] +2000 power during this battle.
